name: Falling Robots
storyline: What is happening to robots when they are not needed anymore? You play as a robot who is falling to its death. To survive you must dodge platforms and kill mutant turtles. On your way down you would find and collect data, which will help you to hack into the next area.
summary: Falling Robots is a free retro arcade game with pixelated graphics and an addictive gameplay. You play as a robot who is falling to its death. To survive you must dodge platforms and kill mutant turtles. On your way down you would find and collect data, which will help you to hack into the next area.
